Episode.GuestStars: |Alan King|Brent Michael|Debra Wilson|Diane Robin|Haley Joel Osment|Jerry Sroka|Jon Cryer|Michael Chiklis|Robert Costanzo|
Episode.Overview: After the mob helps Peter with destroying his new beat up car, so he can get another new car, he must repay his debt to the mob by taking The Don's nephew, Big Fat Paulie, to the movies. Peter informs Paulie that they can't hang out anymore because of Lois, a misunderstanding that leads Paulie to believe that Peter wants Lois killed.
